AntimatterShow.NAME: Antimatter universe
DESCRIPTION: When you take #b3 #bSkill card in the same round,Gain 1 #yAntimatter  #b==================== #yAntimatter :When you Gain #yBlock from your card, Gain additional #yAntimatter's amount times that base Block, Remove all amount at the end of turn #b==================== (This is an indicator)

PositivematterShow.NAME: Positivematter universe
DESCRIPTION: When you take #b3 #bAttack card in the same round,Gain 1 #yPositivematter  #b==================== #yPositivematter : Every time when you apply #yHploss, Deal additional #yPositiveMatter's amount times that #yHploss Damage, Remove all amount at the end of turn #b==================== (This is an indicator)
